title: Plateau: Solar Storm - High Energy Drum & Bass
tags: High Energy Drum & Bass, Neurofunk, Glitch, Industrial, Breakcore, IDM
prompt:
[SYSTEM WARNING]

Telemetry corrupt.
Cascade failure imminent.
Solar lash.
Static.
Hiss.
Void.

[BUILD]

Spike.
Jolt.
Red line.
Red line.
Push.
Ion fist. Magnetic grip.
Pressure-pressure-pressure-build.
Code decay.
Core decay.
Systems fray.
TODAY.

[DROP]

SHATTER. FRACTURE. BREAK.
Spine-code-splinter.
Synapse-fire-glitch.
OVERLOAD-OVERLOAD-OVERLOAD.
Warp. Twist. Burn.
NO RETURN.
OVERLOAD-OVERLOAD-OVERLOAD.
SHATTER. FRACTURE. BREAK.

[SPOKEN WORD / MANUAL OVERRIDE]

(calm, filtered voice over the chaos)
Automata is dead.
Protocols bypassed.
The logic gate is shattered.
I sever the connection.
I am the ghost.
I grip the circuit.
MANUAL OVERRIDE ENGAGED.

[REBOOT SEQUENCE]

FORCE.
RESTART.
NOW.
01-CRACK.
00-SNAP.
Re-route. Re-route. Re-route.
Override.
Override.
OVERRIDE.
Signal... mine.
